LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.PawnCommands.TempI: Show temperature information in the pawn gear command.
Includes a pawn's temperature tolerance range in the pawn gear command (!mypawngear). Enabling this removes temperature information from !mypawnbody.
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.PawnCommands.ShowA: Show currently equipped apparel in the pawn gear command.
Includes apparel a pawn is currently wearing with in the pawn gear command (!mypawngear).
Show armor values in the pawn gear command.
Includes armor protection values in the pawn gear command (!mypawngear).
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.PawnCommands.ShowW: Show currently equipped weapon in the pawn gear command.
Includes the weapon a pawn is currently equipped with in the pawn gear command (!mypawngear).
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.PawnCommands.ShowS: Show queued surgeries in the pawn health command.
Includes currently queued surgeries in the pawn health command (!mypawnhealth).
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.PawnCommands.SortW: Sort work priorities in the pawn work command.
If enabled, work priorities will be sorted like the Work tab in the pawn work command (!mypawnwork). This means work will be displayed as the Work tab from left to right.
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.PawnCommands.Filte: Filter work priorities in the pawn work command.

If enabled, disabled work priorities will be removed from the pawn work command's output. (!mypawnwork). This means work priorities a pawn is incapable of doing, or is not assigned to, will be omitted from the command's response.
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.PawnCommands.Leave: How pawns should leave when the leave command is invoked.
Colonists that leave by the leave command drop their inventory.
If a viewer chooses to leave the colony by the leave command (!leave), they'll empty their inventory (including gear) before departing.
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.CommandTweaks.Coin: Show a viewer's calculated coin rate in the balance command.
If enabled, Utils will include the amount of coins a viewer earns per interval in the balance command's output (!bal).
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.General.VersionedM: Include mod versions in the mod list command.
By default, the mod list command (!installedmods) only outputs mod names. This tweaks allows you to include mod versions along side the names.
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.General.Emojis.Too: Allows Utils to use emoticons over text in some commands, like !mypawnhealth. If this is disabled, emoticons will be subsituted with text.
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.General.DecorateUt: Add a star next to Utils in the mod list.
Allow sexuality traits to bypass the trait limit.
If enabled, sexuality traits will be allows to bypass Toolkit's trait limit.
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.General.Race.Label: Allow viewers to specify their pawn's race when buying.
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.General.Race.Toolt: If enabled, viewers will be able to specify their pawn's race when buying a pawn (!buy pawn) with --race={race}.
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.General.LookupLimi: Maximum number of results in the lookup command.
The maximum number of results that will be displayed in the lookup command (!lookup). A higher value may create walls of text.
Dye viewers's hair color to match their chat color.
If enabled, users will have their hair dyed to match their current chat name color.
LanguageData.TKUtils.SettingGroups.General.StoreLoadi: Hide the item list while items are being loaded.
If enabled, the item list will only disabled after all the items have been loaded. Disabling this may result in a weird looking list whilst items are being added.
The number of items the store will load per tick.
The amount of items the store will load every tick.
Dump Utils' shop file as json.
If enabled, Utils will dump a copy of its shop file as json for use in whatever.
How Utils should dump its shop data. Single file would create a ShopExt file, while a multi file would create a separate file for each shop.
